author: Danielle Demetriou
title: Japan's self-driving taxis gearing up for 2020 Tokyo Olympics
text: Japan Japanâ€™s self-driving taxis gearing up for 2020 Tokyo Olympics Japanese government gives the go-ahead to piloting self-driving taxis on public roads with a view to launching them by the 2020 Tokyo Olympics The unveiling ceremony for the self-driving taxi in Yokohama, Japan Photo: Reuters By Danielle Demetriou , Tokyo
